question:
27. Desi    "Do you mind if I use your pen to sign
this paper?"
"Just a moment. I haven't finished
writing my curriculum vitae."
Arif
What does the woman want?
A To borrow a pen.
B. To buy some paper,
C. To write an article.
D. To ask his paper,
E. To finish her writing​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A

Penjelasan:

Artinya

Apakah kamu tidak keberatan kalau aku pinjam pulpen kamu buat tandatangani kertas ini?

Jawaban:

A.To borrow a pen

Penjelasan:

Desi ingin meminjam pena milik arif tapi,

Arif sedang menggunakan penanya untuk menyelesaikan tugasnya.

See you at the next answer

Pawuuu

related_questions.question:
35. If you called me, I would see you. This means    A. I will not see you so you don't call me.
B. You call me and I don't see you.
C. You don't call me so I don't see you
D. I see you but can't reply you.
E. I see you but you don't call me.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

d. I see you but can't reply you.

Penjelasan:

aku melihat mu tapi tidak bisa menjawab mu

kena dia cma mau nengok

Jawaban:

C. You don't call me, so I don't see you

Penjelasan:

Semoga Membantu
